gameDetails.name: The Valley of Alchemists: Ghost Expansion
gameDetails.description: The Ghost Expansion allows for a 5-player game, as well as adding two new game modes! The first one - “Companions” - introduces direct player on player interaction as well as increasing the options available to players. The second game mode - “Dragon Contest” - introduces intense competition between players as they try to further their alchemy career while completing unique elixir sets which will award the highest-ranking player with a generous bonus.
